name: akkoma
tagline: A federated microblogging server built on the ActivityPub protocol
description: Akkoma is a lightweight fork of the Pleroma social networking server, built on ActivityPub for federated microblogging. It offers lower resource usage, customization, federation, and is ideal for self-hosting private or public social communities.

features.title: Federated Social Networking
features.description: Enables social interactions across federated servers using ActivityPub

features.title: Microblogging
features.description: Supports short-form posts with replies and media

features.title: Moderation Tools
features.description: Provides controls for content and user management

features.title: Custom Timelines
features.description: Displays local, federated, and personal feeds
